Description: Up for sale is a Hamer Scarab XT Guitar Serial # 4871225 that was manufactured sometime between 2005 and 2008. The Guitar is Fire Engine Red in color, Has two Humbucker Pick-ups that are powered by 500K Volume & Tone Control Potentials that will Drive Your Amp into Heavy Distortion!!! The Body has the radical Explorer Hamer Scarab Body and is made of Alder Wood with the Tune-A-Matic Bridge. The neck is made of Maple with a Rosewood Fret Board. Even though the Guitar has Some Dings on the Front & Dings, Scratches, Belt Buckle Rash on the Back, None of the Dings Penetrate the Paint itself and are in the Heavy Duty Clear Coat That Makes This Guitar Shine. That's why they are hard to capture on camera (pictures 9 & 10). The Guitar Looks Great and Sounds Great. Everything Works perfectly on the Guitar and Everything is there and is original. The Guitar comes in a Beautiful Heavy Duty Black Hamer Case that is in Outstanding Condition with No Issues. This Hamer Scarab XT is a Great Guitar and one Heck of an AXE!!! This is The Best Guitar That Hamer Ever Made!!! Danny G.
Title: Hamer Scarab XT Guitar & Case--Humbucker Pick-ups--Fire Engine Red
ConditionDescription: Very Good Used Condition with some Dings in the Clear Coat (picture 9), but the dings do not penetrate the paint--only in the heavy clear coat. Has some scratches and belt buckle rash on the rear (picture 10) but looks great and has a heavy duty finish that shines (That's why there is some glare in the pictures). Everything works great on the Guitar (both pick-ups, volume & Tone control), and the Guitar comes in a Beautiful Black Hamer Case that is in great condition with no issues. This is a Great Guitar THAT LOOKS AND SOUNDS AWESOME!!!
